transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Good morning. Ha Vishal ji. Kaise ho sir?
Customer: Are yaar lead nahi aa rahi yaar.
Executive: Kya dikkat aa rahi hai sir bataye lead kya?
Customer: Lead aa hi nahi rahi hai.
Executive: A, mai dekhta hu aapka. Mai pareshan ho raha hu lead aa nahi rahi hai bilkul bhi. Ab ye dekh lo ki pichle mahine pura khali gaya aur abhi bhi hai jo kuch bhi lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Kya matlab lead?
Executive: Lead abhi nahi dikhni hai wo to sir. Wo mere kaam ki nahi hai wo lead. Wo to aise to hazaro lead padi hai lekin apne kaam ki nahi hai wo.
Customer: Kis categories to aapki sahi hai. Aap manually search kar sakte hai ek baar.
Customer: To wo manually kar li maine search. Lekin fir bhi wo lead nahi aa rahi hai matlab. Aur trade.indiamart.com pe jaake search kiya aapne?
Customer: Ha usme bhi dekh liya usme bhi dekh liya waha pe bhi lead aa hi nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Sir fir aapke product me lead generate hi nahi ho rahi hogi aisa hoga.
Customer: Aisa thodi hota hai yaar. Aisa thodi hota hai.
Executive: Agar lead dekho agar trade.indiamart.com se plan lene ka fayda kya hai?
Customer: Sir fayda hai aapki visibility hai fayda kyu nahi hai aur kaam milta hai aisa bhi nahi hai ki kaam nahi milta.
Customer: Nahi mil raha na kaam yaar ek mahina ho gaya pareshan hu mai yaar.
Executive: Nahi aapne communication nahi kari hai last week me.
Customer: To ye jitni bhi lead abhi aa rahi hai filhal ek bhi inme aapko kaam ki nahi lag rahi?
Customer: Kaam ki nahi hai mere.
Executive: Ab jo catalog kaam ke hoti to aapke product ko hi dekh ke ja rahe hai. Hai?
Executive: Jo catalog use hai wo to aapke product ko hi dekh ke ja rahe hai jaise ek customer aaya tha ye Maharashtra ka tha blue morpho green tea shampoo kar ye dekh ke gaya hai aapki profile me.
Customer: Are yaar ek baat batao aapki jo lead hai ek lead kitne ki pad rahi hai mere ko aapke yaha se plan me? Batao chalo.
Executive: Sir sir by lead cost nahi hoti aapka plan saal bhar ka hota hai aur hum by lead. Meri suno meri baat suno meri baat suno. Chalo thik hai saal bhar ka plan hai aap usme calculate karke dekho ek lead kitne ki pad rahi hai mere ko.
Executive: Sir mai aapka sense samajh raha hu but us tarah se calculate nahi ki jaati fir cheeze.
Customer: To kaise karu calculate aap batao mere ko ab ye jo shampoo dikh raha hai na aapko suno meri baat ye shampoo ka DP price 200 200 rupya hai MRP 229 rupya hai. MRP ke hisab se agar isko sell karu to 29 rup bach rahe hai. Ab agar mai isko lead ko le leta hu consume kar leta hu. Hmm. Hmm. To is shampoo ko bhejne me mujhe 80 rup courier kar lag raha hai. Hmm. Thik hai. Ab mujhe mujhe batao business kitna fayde ka hua. To ye order aapka one ye jaruri to nahi hai ki one bottle ka hi hoga ya two bottle ka hi hoga. Ha one bottle ka hi aata hai one bottle ka hi hai. Maine kai leke dekh liye aise. Ye gharu gharu gharelu jo log hote hai na khud ke kaam ke liye lete hai wahi hai bas ye aur kuch nahi hai dekh rakhe hai maine. Mai puri dekh chuka hu ye sari cheeze isliye matlab bata raha hu ki kuch bhi matlab nahi hai yaar.
Executive: Sir dekhiye fir to iske bare me mai ek baar aapko apne manager se hi connect karaunga last time bhi Yasin sir ne hi aapse baat ki thi aapko yaad hoga hai na sir. Kyuki dekho product. Jinhone suno meri baat jinhone mere ko plan dilwaya tha na ye unka naam Anivesh hai unse baat karwao meri.
Executive: Sir wo unko maine phone kiya tha hai? Hai? Ha bolo bolo.
Customer: Unko maine paanch saat din pehle phone kiya tha to unhone kaha tha 10 minute me call karta hu aur 10 minute chhodo aaj paanch saat din ho gaye abhi tak call nahi kiya.
Executive: Sir actually kya hai wo aapke profile pe nahi hai aapki profile ka jo account manager hai wo mai hi hu mai hi aapki cheeze dekhta hu yaha se jo bhi. Hai?
Executive: Jo bhi aapka kaam hai wo sir hum hi karte hai yaha se. Lekin aapko to pichli baar hi nahi hua hal solution pichli baar nahi nikla aapka to. Sir jo jo cheez aap maang rahe hai wo nahi ho sakti jo cheeze hai wo hai sir aapko. To fir plan ko break karwa do. Jo possible solution hai wo to aapko diya ja raha hai. Possible solution mai batata hu na plan break karwao fir kya matlab hai faltu paisa kharch karwane ka. Sir aapki hai India mart aap uske liye rahe sir aur lead to ek baar suno meri baat suno mujhe income nahi hogi to mai kya karunga India mart pe reh ke batao jara. Baat aapki. Aap khud hi soch ke batao. Ji ji aapki baat. Agar aapko salary nahi milegi to aap job kyu karoge ye batao mere ko. Kyo apna samay kharab karoge. Aapki baat. Aap apna samay kharab. Nahi nahi nahi sir aisa nahi hai. To bas to bas. Mai ek baar fir se sir ise koshish karta hu Yasin sir wagera aap mai ek baar sir se baat karta hu is bare me kaise aapko ye cheeze thik ho sakti hai kyuki kaafi samay se aapka issue chal raha hai dobara se hai na. Pichle saal bhi pareshan raha tha mai pichle saal bhi pareshan raha tha mai aur is saal bhi pareshan hi hu mai to. Thik hai sir ek baar mai aapko apne senior se baat karke is cheez ke liye batata hu. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough leads.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads.

- Wants to know the cost per lead.

- Wants to talk to Anivesh, who sold the plan.



Resolution:

- Executive explained that cost per lead is not calculated.

- Executive offered to connect with a senior manager.

- Executive mentioned the customer's profile was being viewed.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss the issue with his senior.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, plan
